resources.string: Your AI-powered assistant for Jaundice Detection. Capture or upload an image of your eye, and let AI analyze your sclera for signs of jaundice.
✅ Capture a clear image of your face or upload an existing one. The eye region will be automatically segmented for analysis.
✅ Our AI will analyze the sclera for possible jaundice signs.
✅ Get immediate results with a clear and easy-to-understand assessment.
⚠️ JaundiceNot is not a medical diagnostic tool. It provides an AI-based analysis but does not replace professional medical advice.
⚠️ If you receive a positive result or experience symptoms, consult a healthcare provider for confirmation and further evaluation.
⚠️ Image quality matters! Ensure good lighting and avoid excessive reflections for the best results.
Tap below to begin your scan and take control of your health!
Jaundice, also known as icterus, is a yellowish or greenish pigmentation of the skin and sclera due to high bilirubin levels.
